metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27347 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use after free in lzma_decompress_buf function in stream.c in Irzip 0.631 allows attackers to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted compressed file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631-1+deb9u3build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.631-1+deb9u3build0.18.04.1').
